TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content:
I don't WANT to know her secrets! We assume she's female, and that is THAT!

So you don't want to know the secrets to everything in the universe? And nothing is final.

There's no such thing as a Toblerone universe. Don't be ridiculous. Now, pardon me while I head back to my vanilla icecream with sliced strawberries topping universe.

...

*locks him/her in*
Just realised that this thread has the highest amount of posts than all the other off-topic threads!!! Lets celebrate:

So you don't want to know the secrets to everything in the universe? And nothing is final.

No. Her secrets are to great for mankind to grasp!

Just realised that this thread has the highest amount of posts than all the other off-topic threads!!! Lets celebrate:

*dramatic gun cock*

No. Her secrets are to great for mankind to grasp!

So she isn't part of mankind? Also:

Everyone celebrate!

So she isn't part of mankind?

Like you know! She might be a super human!
Dark. Chocolate. Tobelone... *drooooool*

Dark. Chocolate. Tobelone... *drooooool*

If we give you 100 of them would you spill your secrets?

If we give you 100 of them would you spill your secrets?

*cruise missile* I thought we were friends...
What do you have against dark chocolate Toblerones?
Oh come on, Leon, he's just a Jedi. Jedi are laughably easy to defeat.

What do you have against dark chocolate Toblerones?

When used for evil, even the best of things can be corrupted...

Oh come on, Leon, he's just a Jedi. Jedi are laughably easy to defeat.

Didn't I trap you in a sandwich universe?
Ok then. I AM YOUR FATHER JEDI MASTER!

Ok, I'll tell you all...

Chobit is neither male nor female. The earthly body is merely a vessel for a super-evolved form of life, that in it's natural state is a amorphous cloud of golden gas. This... being.. was sent to you, to show you the way humanity can be, if you cease to be petty and argumentative.

And now because you forced the secret out of it's caretaker, we must depart this plane and leave you to your own devices. Farewell, friends.

Ok, now where's my chocolate???

Ok, I'll tell you all...

Chobit is neither male nor female. The earthly body is merely a vessel for a super-evolved form of life, that in it's natural state is a amorphous cloud of golden gas. This... being.. was sent to you, to show you the way humanity can be, if you cease to be petty and argumentative.

And now because you forced the secret out of it's caretaker, we must depart this plane and leave you to your own devices. Farewell, friends.

Ok, now where's my chocolate???

Give us the scientific proof and we'll talk about that chocolate. And what is the earthly body's gender?
Phew! Happy, now?

Give us the scientific proof and we'll talk about that chocolate. And what is the earthly body's gender?

Your current medical science is not up to the task of detecting us. We are indistinguishable from the host.

And this concept of gender confuses us. Which is the one with the bumps on the front again?

Your current medical science is not up to the task of detecting us. We are indistinguishable from the host.

And this concept of gender confuses us. Which is the one with the bumps on the front again?

Depends on the weight of the body. If it is too heavy, then the genders are indistinguishable by bump detection.

And how do your species reproduce then?

*attempts to soothe the madness*

So uh. Who has pets?

This is my cat:

Edited May 22, 2013 by Nutt007
Cats are often the cause of madness or the symptom. And we shall not stop to find out all of chobit's secrets!

Depends on the weight of the body. If it is too heavy, then the genders are indistinguishable by bump detection.

And how do your species reproduce then?

It is... complicated. Consider the race Q, of your Star Trek program. The episode that uses the American Civil War as a metaphor for dissent among the omnipotent. What happens, and what is observed differ greatly.

Depends on the weight of the body. If it is too heavy, then the genders are indistinguishable by bump detection.

And how do your species reproduce then?

"It's just a show; I should really just relax."

--MST3K Mantra

It is... complicated. Consider the race Q, of your Star Trek program. The episode that uses the American Civil War as a metaphor for dissent among the omnipotent. What happens, and what is observed differ greatly.

I know that episode, I've watched it a hundred times...

But how did your species evolve to that form?
